metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20277

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP2

SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5

metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Samba's libldb. Multiple, consecutive leading spaces in an LDAP attribute can lead to an out-of-bounds memory write, leading to a crash of the LDAP server process handling the request. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.
